resources.string:
Special thanks to:

 Laura Welkenhuyzen - French translations
 Fabrizio - Italian translations
 Matteo - Spanish translations


 Hi! My name is Cédric Vandelaer and first of all thanks for checking out my app! I'm a master student computer science at the university of Hasselt (Belgium) and I enjoy reading comics in my free time. I'm also a big fan of android so I decided to make a comic viewer app in my free time. I wasn't really happy with existing apps because of their poor performance, overly complex interfaces or just because I didn't like how they looked. Well anyway, have fun reading comics with Comic Viewer!

v2.5
 - New app icon
 - Translations for Spanish, Italian and French

 v2.4
 - Image folder support
 - Dutch translations added
 - Fixed a bug that occurred when the app restarted after a long while
 - Added gold and indigo app themes (PRO)
 - Speed improvements

 v2.3.1
 - Fixed a crash for some users

 v2.3
 - Muzei support

 v2.2.1
 - Small bugfixes

 v2.2
 - Currently reading section
 - Microsoft OneDrive support
 - Hide comics and folders (PRO)
 - Turn pages with volume keys (PRO)
 - Reload comics
 - Bugfixes

 v2.1.3
 - Better cleanup of data files when they are no longer needed

 v2.1.2
 - Fixed a crash for some users

 v2.1.1
 - Added transition to the info page

 v2.1
 - Fixed manga mode
 - Rename folders

 v2.0
 - Dropbox support
 - Manga support
 - Option to choose the file format (Pro)
 - Option to keep the screen on
 - Option to rotate landscape pages in portrait mode
 - Better folder navigation

 v1.3.1
 - Open comics from other apps
 - Changed recents icon
 - Added support for more devices

 v1.3
 - Folder view
 - Increased loading speeds
 - Bugfixes

 v1.2
 - Landscape mode
 - Option to auto fit pages in landscape mode
 - Bugfixes
 - Navigation drawer image loading improvements
 - Ads now only show at the start and the end of a comic

 v1.1.1
 - Added the option to show page numbers for a short time on page change
 - Bugfixes

 v1.1
 - Added additional styling options for the pro version
 - Changed the app drawer image
 - Bugfixes

 v1.0.2
 - Fixed a bug where unrecognized files could not be deleted

 v1.0.1
 - Fixed bug with comics opening slow when loading

 v1
 - Initial release

Usa i tasti volume per voltare pagina (PRO)
Questa funzionalità richiede la versione pro della app.
In orizzontale adatta pagina alla dimensione dello schermo
Usa i tasti volume per voltare pagina
"E\' occorso un errore durante lo scaricamento"
Nota: funziona solo su device lollipop
Nota: solo per card piccole e normali
Questa cartella non può essere rinominata…
L\'app deve essere riavviata per completare l\'operazione
Attendi mentre l\'app aggiorna i dati relativi ai comic salvati.
Sei sicuro di voler cancellare il seguente file:
Non hai ancora iniziato questo fumetto!
Attendi mentre l\'app aggiora i dati del comic.
Nota: I caratteri speciali verranno rimossi
Si è presentato un errore durante l\'autenticazione…
Usa le tue copertine come sfondo
Nota: il path di default \'main storage/ComicViewer\' non può essere rimosso
